Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AreaAttackAction
    An action to perform an area attack
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    BecomePileOfBonesAction
    Class that represents the action for become pile of boners
    BreatheFireAction
    An action to set surrounding ground on fire
    BuyAction
    An action to allow actors to buy items that are buyable
    ConsumeAction
    A consume action which represents all item that should be consumed
    ConsumeRuneAction
    An action that will give the actor a random amount of runes based on the runeAmount decided in the GoldeRunes class
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    DespawnAction
    Class that represents the Despawn action which removes the actor from that map when executed
    ExchangeAction
    Class that represents the action to exchange an item in exchange for 1 of 2 items in this implementation
    RemoveAction
    Class that represents removal of actors when called
    RestAction
    A class that represents the 'rest action' implemented when standing on The First Step
    RetrieveAction
    abstract class that represents all items that may be retrieved
    RetrieveRuneAction
    Class that represents a retrieve rune action
    SellAction
    Class that represents the action to sell an item
    TravelAction
    A class that will perform the action of moving a player to a different map when stepping on a GoldenFogDoor
